text: Gei mee ga hai dama labelaa ga haanau mai dana dama daane, gei mee ga helekai, “Dolomeenei gei au ga hagaamu a Dimaadua.” Gei mee gaa gahi di ingoo o maa bolo “Judah”,29.35 Judah: di ingoo deenei le e hai dono lee be telekai Hebrew boloo, “Hagaamu”  ga i nomuli gei Leah gu hagalee hai ana dama.
